Thank you:

All who  seed this series of 25 disk. It's a long list and large files.

I'm asking your help. 

Please... After you complete a download Leave it to seed until a couple more people can take your place.

I've tried off and on for more than a year to make this teaching course available.

This is my last run. 

I'll be off the net in a couple of weeks. 

It's up to you whether these torrents live or die.

What kinda file format is this? Well, I can play it in my Win Media if I rename it to something like .mpeg. But I can't do anything with the original file and none of the converters seem to recognize it. I would love to get it on my IPod.

This file was never intended for IPOD.
Renaming the file did NOT make it play on media player. Had you changed the file associations it would have played anyway.   mp4 IS a mpeg format.
Get Nero Recode, will convert anything you like.

BEFORE you put down money for any TEFL / TESOL course take 3 minutes to download and read:
